messages.content: I was at Google as a PM, but I moved teams last year.
Okay.
Now I'm at OpenAI on the policy team. New manager is Priya.
Got it.
Actually, Priya moved to another org. My manager is Leo now.
Thanks for the update.
My teammate Alex is on ML Infra. We pair on a weekly experiment review.
Okay.
Sam handles compliance on our side. Sam works closely with Riya in Legal.
Understood.
We collaborate with the Research org. The lead there is Dr. Chen.
Noted.
I'm leading the incident response playbook refresh. The dependency is a data retention policy from Legal.
Got it.
Legal says Riya owns that policy. I need a draft by the 15th.
Understood.
We're planning a move to a new team called Trust & Safety. It should happen next quarter.
Thanks.
If that happens, Alex might stay in ML Infra, but Iâ€™ll move with policy.
Noted.
